newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products mixed, fuel barges firmer.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products mixed, fuel barges firmer.

text.p: NWE oil products were mixed on Thursday, traders said, with gas oil following the screen down.
High sulphur fuel barges closed a shade firmer at $85.50 fob ARA and cargoes were quiet. One percent was talked steady to firmer at $95/$95.50 but no buying interest was seen.
Gasoline held steady with eurograde barges at $187/8 but the arb to the U.S was looking less open.
Gas oil slid in sympathy with a $3 fall in front month July IPE futures, which ended at $164.50 a tonne.
Poor demand was bearish for heat oil cargoes but a very prompt need forced one buyer to pay July IPE +$3.25 cif NWE for 0.2 percent sulphur material. Barges were quiet.
